name: Data Diver
description:
Kenya 2039 - Capital of United States of Africa- Central Earth Server

A server is a symbol, as is the act of destroying it. Symbols are given power by people. Alone, a symbol is meaningless, but if we are united, blowing up a server can change the world.

Play and Hack the full screen HD version here:

http://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=9420193

Feel free to send me new levels or suggestion.

#cyberpunkjam

Code by @arnaud_debock

Music by @imrekiss

DATA DIVER is completely FREE for anyone to play, however there is a donation option on this page if you wish to support me monetarily. It helps me to continue doing free game and buy some cookie.
